ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: they fall to the ground in prostration, and it increases them in humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And weeping they kneel down, and this increases their humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And they fall down upon their faces, weeping, and their humility increases when (the Qur'an) is recited to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They bow down in prostration and weep and it makes them more humble (before the Lord).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they fall down on their faces weeping, and this Qur’an increases their humility. (Command of prostration # 4).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they fall down on their chins (faces) weeping and it increases their humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they fall down on their faces weeping, and it adds to their humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they fall down upon their faces weeping; and it increases them in humility.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They fall down on their faces, weeping, and it increaseth humility in them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They fall down upon their faces weeping, and [the Quran] increases their humility."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they fall down on their chins weeping, and it increaseth them in humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Weeping, they fall down on their faces, and it increases them in humility.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They fall down on their faces in tears, and it increases their (earnest) humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they fall down on their faces weeping and it adds to their humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They fall down upon their chin, weeping and it increases them in humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they fall to their chins, weeping, and it adds to their humility.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:109] And they fall down on their faces, weeping (yabkūna is a supplement [to yakhirrūna, ‘they fall down’] also containing an adjectival qualification [of those falling down]); and it, the Qur’ān, increases them in humility’, in humbleness before God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They fall down on their faces) in prostration, (weeping) in their prostration, (and it increaseth humility in them) this was revealed about 'Abdullah Ibn Salam and his companions.
